parametrized_description: A drug company operates NumFactories factories to produce NumProducts products. Each factory j has a ProductionRate[i][j] for each product i per hour. Each factory j requires ResourceRequirement[j] units of a rare compound per hour. The company has TotalResource units of the rare compound available. The company must produce at least MinProduction[i] units of each product i. Determine the operating hours for each factory to minimize the total time needed.

ProductionRate.description: Production rate of product i in factory j per hour

ResourceRequirement.description: Resource requirement of factory j per hour

TotalResource.description: Total available units of the rare compound

MinProduction.description: Minimum required production of product i

OperationalLevel.description: The operational level of each factory j

MaxOperatingHours.description: The maximum operating hours across all factories

constraints.description: Each factory requires ResourceRequirement[j] units of the rare compound per hour. The total consumption of the rare compound across all factories cannot exceed TotalResource units.

code.gurobipy: model.addConstr(quicksum(ResourceRequirement[j] * OperationalLevel[j] for j in range(NumFactories)) <= TotalResource)

constraints.description: Each factory j produces ProductionRate[i][j] units of product i per hour. The total production of each product i across all factories must be at least MinProduction[i] units.

code.gurobipy:
model.addConstrs(
    (quicksum(ProductionRate[i][j] * OperationalLevel[j] for j in range(NumFactories)) 
     >= MinProduction[i] for i in range(NumProducts)),
    name="MinProduction"
)

objective.description: Minimize the maximum operating hours across all factories required to meet the minimum production requirements while adhering to the limited availability of the rare compound.
